actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Humane Methods of Livestock Slaughter Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to regulate the commercial transportation of horses for slaughter, and for other purposes.
short_title: Humane and Safe Commercial Transportation of Horses for Slaughter Act of 1994

summary.text: Humane and Safe Commercial Transportation of Horses for Slaughter Act of 1994 - Amends Federal law to require the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations governing the humane commercial transportation of horses for slaughter. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Humane and Safe Commercial Transportation of Horses for Slaughter Act of 1994

A bill to amend the Federal Humane Methods of Livestock Slaughter Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to regulate the commercial transportation of horses for slaughter, and for other purposes.
